title: Global Visibility Records
description:
Creates 4 Global Visibility Records
 - 3 Master records for the 'Record Summary Card' widget, which represents individual site.
 - 1 Global record for the 'Record Summary Tile' widget, which represents count of records across all sites.
  
 These Records help populate the dashboard with mock data

Steps.name: Scenario - Create Global Visibility Records
Steps.preCreateMessage: Creating demo record for Global Visibility Dashboard
